data.title: What we know about Luka's Lakers fit, 365 days after his debut: Big decisions loom
data.summary: Let's revisit the first 365 days of the Luka Doncic era in Los Angeles and examine how the Lakers can return to championship contention.

data.title: LeBron calls out Lakers: We're not a title team
data.summary: LeBron James says the Lakers are not a "championship team" after losing to the Thunder.

data.title: Four tossed after brawl in Pistons-Hornets game
data.summary: A fight broke out between the Pistons and Hornets on Monday night, leading to the ejections of Charlotte's Moussa Diabate and Miles Bridges and Detroit's Jalen Duren and Isaiah Stewart.

data.title: Ingram added to All-Star Game, replacing Curry
data.summary: Raptors forward Brandon Ingram has been named as the replacement for injured Warriors star Stephen Curry for this weekend's NBA All-Star Game.

data.title: Wolves' Reid, Hawks' Gueye ejected after scuffle
data.summary: Timberwolves center Naz Reid and Hawks forward Mouhamed Gueye were ejected Monday night after an altercation.

data.title: Clips say NBA probe not impacting their decisions
data.summary: The Clippers are still waiting on the results of the NBA's investigation into alleged cap circumvention related to Kawhi Leonard but said the looming decision hasn't impacted "anything that we do."

data.title: Tatum cleared to practice with G League squad
data.summary: The Celtics said Jayson Tatum would participate in portions of the G League practice at the Auerbach Center in Boston along with teammates Hugo Gonzalez and Amari Williams before being recalled by Boston.

data.title: OKC's Topic returns to court after cancer diagnosis
data.summary: Thunder prospect Nikola Topic made his NBA G League debut Monday night after recovering from a major knee injury and undergoing cancer treatment.

data.title: Warriors star Butler has surgery on torn ACL
data.summary: Injured Golden State Warriors star Jimmy Butler underwent successful surgery on his torn right ACL on Monday morning in Los Angeles.

data.title: ✍ Trade grades: Reactions for every transaction

data.title: What this NBA trade deadline revealed: Teams are finding new ways to tank
data.summary: Much to the irritation of some league insiders, the trade deadline was more than just a flurry of moves: It showed the next evolution in teams racing to the bottom.

data.title: Play-in push or lottery pick? What's ahead for Giannis and the Bucks
data.summary: The trade deadline passed Thursday, and Giannis Antetokounmpo is still on the Bucks. What's next for Milwaukee and its superstar?

data.title: 'It's over. Guys are gone': What James Harden and the Clippers realized before the shocking trade
data.summary: The Harden trade was a mutual recognition as much as an admission -- that the 11-time All-Star had a better chance to win elsewhere, and a tumultuous era in LA was effectively over.

data.title: Harden for Garland: Grading this NBA point guard blockbuster
data.summary: James Harden is a Cavalier. Darius Garland is a Clipper. Kevin Pelton grades each side of the trade.
